prevtext: For each positive integer $p$ let $G_p$ be the image of $u_p$. We have the following exact sequence:

text: \[M_{\sharp}=\{s\in R\mid \exists 0\ne x\in M\ \mathrm{such\ that}\ sx=0\}\quad\mathrm{and}\quad M^{\sharp}=\{s\in R\mid sM\subset M\}.\]
